modName: Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNPB-BBP x
summary: This mod adds sorceress outfits with UNPB body shape. Support Breast Bouncing motion for CHSBHC system.
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]AZdIJKADlOQ[/youtube] 
uploaded by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1039155]kasparesky[/url]

[youtube]_P5i6jjCfOo[/youtube]
Featured in Skyrim Mods by MMOxReview[/center]
Requirement
===========
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP BLESSED BODY- BBP[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11767]Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP[/url]

How to use:
===========
The costumes are craftable at any forge.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Backsteppo
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to dimon99 for creating UNP.
Thanks to SkyrimNexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.

Thanks to God for creating us all.
